item.title: @PessoaBrain @WiringTheBrain @DLBarack @DrYohanJohn I guess I would say no. There are good normative, algorithmic, and mechanistic reasons for power laws that are very non-specific. Keep in mind that all kinds of data show such scaling behavior.

item.title:
Ever wondered what university Vice Chancellors actually do?
The truth is they feed off the academic system in a similar way to commercial academic publishers, extracting maximum personal benefit while delivering very little of value.
